channel.title: Our Haunt (5/5) on Sundays in May
channel.description:
We can't remember how we died.
A broken down mansion, a few shattered memories, a whispered song, the promise of a family, and the watchful eyes of something sinister.
Welcome home
Our Haunt is a gm-full story-telling game by Rae Nedjadi about ghosts haunting a mansion, about finding out who they were and who they are now, and what other things lurk in their home. This is the first of five sessions.
-----------------------------------
This game will have two guests: Curious Cat and Rae Nedjadi.
**System** : Our Haunt
**Duration** : Five 3 hour sessions
**Breaks** : 1 on top of every hour
**Venue** : GM’s Zoom
**Recording** : No
Session 1 ([date=2022-05-01 time=12:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MxRC_ZNy8Xeh2UuLzpK Session 2 ([date=2022-05-08 time=12:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MxRCm3v_pfTWecnlPeq Session 3 ([date=2022-05-15 time=12:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MxRD5CF8QjofbP49hKY Session 4 ([date=2022-05-22 time=12:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MxRDJrAKLGmZcotLA7z Session 5 ([date=2022-05-29 time=12:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MxRDqGcirq0SUExaEKV

item.title: Our Haunt (5/5) on Sundays in May
item.dc:creator: @SabineV5
item.description:
@SabineV5 wrote:

We can’t remember how we died.

A broken down mansion, a few shattered memories, a whispered song, the promise of a family, and the watchful eyes of something sinister.

Welcome home

Our Haunt is a gm-full story-telling game by Rae Nedjadi about ghosts haunting a mansion, about finding out who they were and who they are now, and what other things lurk in their home. This is the first of five sessions.

This game will have two guests: Curious Cat and Rae Nedjadi.

System : Our Haunt

Duration : Five 3 hour sessions

Breaks : 1 on top of every hour

Venue : GM’s Zoom

Recording : No

Session 1 (2022-05-01T10:00:00Z): https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MxRC_ZNy8Xeh2UuLzpK
